studies.views.study_views.necessity_required(*args, **kwargs)¶

This call checks whether the necessity questions are required. They are required when: - The researcher requires a supervisor AND one of these cases applies:

  • A selected AgeGroup requires details.
  • Participants have been selected on certain traits.
  • Participants are legally incapable.
